title: Namaskaram
description: As a certified and passionate yoga instructor, [Instructor Name] brings over [X] years of experience to guide individuals through the transformative journey of yoga. Specializing in Live Online Classes, Yoga Workshops, and Personalized Yoga Plans, [Instructor Name] caters to all skill levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners.

offerings.title: Live Online Classes
offerings.description: Accessible from the comfort of your home, these interactive sessions focus on improving flexibility, strength, mindfulness, and overall well-being. With real-time guidance and personalized adjustments, students receive the same attention they would in a physical studio.

offerings.title: Yoga Workshops
offerings.description: Immersive, in-depth workshops designed to deepen your practice, whether focusing on specific techniques, breathing exercises (Pranayama), or meditation. These sessions provide tools for holistic health and stress management.

offerings.title: Personalized Yoga Plans
offerings.description: Tailored yoga programs based on your unique goals and needs. Whether you're looking to build strength, increase flexibility, relieve stress, or recover from injury, [Instructor Name] develops custom plans for sustainable growth and well-being.
